iniValues.name: bActorSelfShadowing
iniValues.notes: bActorSelfShadowing toggles the ability for actors to cast shadows upon themselves.

iniValues.name: bAllow20HairShader
iniValues.notes: bAllow20HairShader is used to print the 2.0 hairw value in RendererInfo.txt.

iniValues.name: bAllowScreenShot
iniValues.notes: bAllowScreenShot toggles the ability to save a screenshot with the PrintScreen key.

iniValues.name: bAlwaysActive
iniValues.notes: bAlwaysActive toggles the ability of the game to remain active when it is out of focus (i.e. if in a windowed mode setup, if one clicks outside the game window with this enabled, the game will not pause).

iniValues.name: bAlwaysRunByDefault
iniValues.notes: bAlwaysRunByDefault toggles the ability of the character to always run by default. If turned off, you can still run, but walking is the default action.

iniValues.name: bAutoViewDistance
iniValues.notes: bAutoViewDistance toggles FPS based far clipping distance.

iniValues.name: bBackgroundLoadLipFiles
iniValues.notes: bBackgroundLoadLipFiles toggles the ability for the game to background load lip files used by NPCs, which can reduce stutter when loading multiple NPCs.

iniValues.name: bBorderRegionsEnabled
iniValues.notes: bBorderRegionsEnabled toggles the borders at the edges of the map.

iniValues.name: bDisableAllGore
iniValues.notes: bDisableAllGore toggles gory effects, such as blood.

iniValues.name: bDisableCombatDialogue
iniValues.notes: bDisableCombatDialogue toggles those cheeky comments that enemies say while in combat.

iniValues.name: bDisplayMissingContentDialogue
iniValues.notes: bDisplayMissingContentDialogue toggles the missing content warning when loading a saved game missing a previously enabled plugin.

iniValues.name: bDo30VFog
iniValues.notes: bDo30VFog was meant to enable fog volumes, but the their code is unreachable and non-functional.

iniValues.name: bDoActorShadows
iniValues.notes: bDoActorShadows is meant to toggle actor inclusion in the full scene shadow pass. The code for full scene shadows is unused.

iniValues.name: bDoAmbientPass
iniValues.notes: bDoAmbientPass toggles the ambient render pass.

iniValues.name: bDoCanopyShadowPass
iniValues.notes: bDoCanopyShadowPass toggles the canopy shadow render pass.

iniValues.name: bDoDiffusePass
iniValues.notes: bDoDiffusePass toggles the diffuse texture render pass.

iniValues.name: bDoSpecularPass
iniValues.notes: bDoSpecularPass toggles specularity on meshes with normal maps, disabling this will make the game look more dull and will also disable environment mapping but will increase performance.

iniValues.name: bDoStaticAndArchShadows
iniValues.notes: bDoStaticAndArchShadows is meant to toggle static and architecture inclusion in the full scene shadow pass. The code for full scene shadows is unused.

iniValues.name: bDoTestHDR
iniValues.notes: bDoTestHDR is meant to load test HLSL files for HDR shaders (debug setting).

iniValues.name: bDoTexturePass
iniValues.notes: bDoTexturePass toggles the texture render pass.

iniValues.name: bDynamicWindowReflections
iniValues.notes: Unused. Leftover from Oblivion's window reflections.

iniValues.name: bEnableEnviroEffectsOnPC
iniValues.notes:
bEnableEnviroEffectsOnPC toggles 3D audio post processing effects. Only usable on pre-Vista Windows or through WINE. 

Source: https://geckwiki.com/index.php?title=INI_Settings

iniValues.name: bForce1XShaders
iniValues.notes: bForce1XShaders toggles shader loading, crashing the game if enabled.

iniValues.name: bForceNPCsUseAmmo
iniValues.notes: bForceNPCsUseAmmo toggles unlimited NPC ammo. If enabled, NPCs will no longer have access to unlimited ammo, but shall be forced to only use the ammo they possess.

iniValues.name: bForcePow2Textures
iniValues.notes: bForcePow2Textures toggles the forced creation of square rendered textures.

iniValues.name: bHideUnavailablePerks
iniValues.notes: bHideUnavailablePerks toggles the ability for perks whose requirements have not been met to be hidden in the level up menu.

iniValues.name: bImageSpaceEffects
iniValues.notes: bImageSpaceEffects toggles the rendering of post process shaders.

iniValues.name: bLoadBackgroundFaceGen
iniValues.notes: Unused. The game is hardcoded to have background face loading always on.

iniValues.name: bLoadHelmetsInBackground
iniValues.notes: bLoadHelmetsInBackground toggles background loading of helmets.

iniValues.name: bLODNoiseAniso
iniValues.notes: bLODNoiseAniso toggles anisotropic filtering for LOD noise.

iniValues.name: bMTRendering
iniValues.notes: bMTRendering is meant to enable multithreaded geometry accumulation and rendering, but the code is broken and crashes the game.

iniValues.name: bMultiThreadAudio
iniValues.notes: bMultiThreadAudio toggles an additional worker thread for minor performance improvement. Without the New Vegas Tick Fix, this can cause the game to hang when you go to exit the game.

iniValues.name: bSelectivePurgeUnusedOnFastTravel
iniValues.notes: bSelectivePurgeUnusedOnFastTravel toggles the ability for the game to unload cells upon fast travel, lowering memory usage.

iniValues.name: bSetDemigodMode
iniValues.notes: bSetDemigodMode toggles demigod mode (also toggleable in the console via the "TDM" command). In demigod mode, you don't have unlimited ammo and you need to reload, but you're still invincible and you can carry the entire world.

iniValues.name: bShadowsOnGrass
iniValues.notes: bShadowsOnGrass is meant to toggle shadow rendering on grass surfaces, but the code is broken and doesn't select proper pixel shaders.

iniValues.name: bShowMenuTextureUse
iniValues.notes: bShowMenuTextureUse toggles inclusion of menu textures in the debug texture stats dump.

iniValues.name: bUse Shaders
iniValues.notes: bUse Shaders toggles shader loading, crashing the game if disabled.

iniValues.name: bUseAudioDebugInformation
iniValues.notes: bUseAudioDebugInformation toggles unnecessary copy operations performed on sound data.

iniValues.name: bUseBackgroundFileLoader
iniValues.notes: Unused. The game is hardcoded to have background loading always on.

iniValues.name: bUseFakeFullScreenMotionBlur
iniValues.notes: bUseFakeFullScreenMotionBlur toggles the motion blur shader?

iniValues.name: bUseMultiThreadedTrees
iniValues.notes: Unused. The game is hardcoded to have background tree loading always on.

iniValues.name: bUsePipboyMode
iniValues.notes: bUsePipboyMode toggles the Pip-boy screen displaying on the Pip-boy model. It will also cause the main menu to be invisible until the game is loaded. Do not change.

iniValues.name: bUseSunbeams
iniValues.notes: bUseSunbeams toggles screenspace sun rays. The effect is broken and can crash the game if enabled.

iniValues.name: bUseThreadedAI
iniValues.notes: bUseThreadedAI toggles the ability for the game to use additional threads for AI tasks.

iniValues.name: fActorLODDefault
iniValues.notes: fActorLODDefault sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Actor Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fActorLODMax
iniValues.notes: fActorLODMax sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Actor Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fActorLODMin
iniValues.notes: fActorLODMin sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Actor Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fBlurIntensityPipboy
iniValues.notes: fBlurIntensityPipboy sets the blur intensity, especially of the text, of the Pip-boy.

iniValues.name: fBlurRadiusPipboy
iniValues.notes: fBlurRadiusPipboy sets the blur radius, especially of the text, of the Pip-boy.

iniValues.name: fDecalLifetime
iniValues.notes: fDecalLifetime sets the time in seconds that some decals will stay visible.

iniValues.name: fDecalLOD0
iniValues.notes: fDecalLOD0 sets the distance that some decals will show, such as bullet impacts.

iniValues.name: fDefault1stPersonFOV
iniValues.notes: fDefault1stPersonFOV sets the hands field of view, affecting the arms and weapons viewmodel seen in 1st person.

iniValues.name: fDefaultBlockLoadDistanceLow
iniValues.notes: fDefaultBlockLoadDistanceLow sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Object LOD Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fDefaultFOV
iniValues.notes: fDefaultFOV sets the field of view in menus, such as the lockpicking interface.

iniValues.name: fDefaultTreeLoadDistance
iniValues.notes: fDefaultTreeLoadDistance sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Tree LOD Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fDefaultWorldFOV
iniValues.notes: fDefaultWorldFOV sets the camera field of view.

iniValues.name: fEnvMapLOD1
iniValues.notes: fEnvMapLOD1 sets the distance at which environment mapping effects start to fade on objects.

iniValues.name: fEnvMapLOD2
iniValues.notes: fEnvMapLOD2 sets the maximum distance to render environment mapping effects on objects.

iniValues.name: fEyeEnvMapLOD1
iniValues.notes: fEyeEnvMapLOD1 sets the distance at which eye environment mapping effects start to fade.

iniValues.name: fEyeEnvMapLOD2
iniValues.notes: fEyeEnvMapLOD2 sets the maximum distance to render eye environment mapping effects.

iniValues.name: fGrassDefaultStartFadeDistance
iniValues.notes: fGrassDefaultStartFadeDistance sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Grass Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fGrassFadeRange
iniValues.notes: fGrassFadeRange sets the range from fGrassStartFadeDistance that grass fades (sinks) into the landscape.

iniValues.name: fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance
iniValues.notes: fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Grass Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fGrassMinStartFadeDistance
iniValues.notes: fGrassMinStartFadeDistance sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Grass Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fGrassWindMagnitudeMax
iniValues.notes: fGrassWindMagnitudeMax sets the maximum wind magnitude blowing grass.

iniValues.name: fGrassWindMagnitudeMin
iniValues.notes: fGrassWindMagnitudeMin sets the minimum wind magnitude blowing grass.

iniValues.name: fHighBlockLoadDistanceLow
iniValues.notes: fHighBlockLoadDistanceLow sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Object LOD Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fHighTreeLoadDistance
iniValues.notes: fHighTreeLoadDistance sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Tree LOD Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fItemLODDefault
iniValues.notes: fItemLODDefault sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Item Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fItemLODMax
iniValues.notes: fItemLODMax sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Item Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fItemLODMin
iniValues.notes: fItemLODMin sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Item Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fLandLOFadeSeconds
iniValues.notes: fLandLOFadeSeconds sets the fade time for loading terrain.

iniValues.name: fLightEffectFadeDuration
iniValues.notes: fLightEffectFadeDuration sets the time it takes to fade the flashlight when opening the Pip-boy when the flashlight is on. Reducing this to around 400 helps alleviate flicker when opening the Pip-Boy when its light is on.

iniValues.name: fLightLODDefaultStartFade
iniValues.notes: fLightLODDefaultStartFade sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Light Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fLightLODMaxStartFade
iniValues.notes: fLightLODMaxStartFade sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Light Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fLightLODMinStartFade
iniValues.notes: fLightLODMinStartFade sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Light Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fLightLODRange
iniValues.notes: fLightLODRange sets the range from fLightLODStartFadeDistance that light fades.

iniValues.name: fLODNoiseMipBias
iniValues.notes: fLODNoiseMipBias sets the mipmap bias for LOD noise texture.

iniValues.name: fLowBlockLoadDistanceLow
iniValues.notes: fLowBlockLoadDistanceLow sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Object LOD Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fLowTreeLoadDistance
iniValues.notes: fLowTreeLoadDistance sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Tree LOD Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fMainMenuMusicVolume
iniValues.notes: fMainMenuMusicVolume sets the main menu music volume level.

iniValues.name: fMaxFootstepDistance
iniValues.notes: fMaxFootstepDistance sets the maximum distance that footsteps can be heard.

iniValues.name: fObjectLODDefault
iniValues.notes: fObjectLODDefault sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Object Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fObjectLODMax
iniValues.notes: fObjectLODMax sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Object Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fObjectLODMin
iniValues.notes: fObjectLODMin sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Object Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fPipboy1stPersonFOV
iniValues.notes: fPipboy1stPersonFOV sets the Pip-Boy and terminal field of view

iniValues.name: fScanlineFrequencyPipboy
iniValues.notes: fScanlineFrequencyPipboy sets the amount of scanlines in the Pip-boy.

iniValues.name: fShadowLODDefaultStartFade
iniValues.notes: fShadowLODDefaultStartFade sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Shadow Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fShadowLODMaxStartFade
iniValues.notes: fShadowLODMaxStartFade sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Shadow Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fShadowLODMinStartFade
iniValues.notes: fShadowLODMinStartFade sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Shadow Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fShadowLODRange
iniValues.notes: fShadowLODRange sets the range from fShadowLODStartFadeDistance that shadows fade.

iniValues.name: fSpecularLODDefaultStartFade
iniValues.notes: fSpecularLODDefaultStartFade sets the default value for the in-game settings display menu Specularity Fade slider if a value is not already set in the ini files.

iniValues.name: fSpecularLODMaxStartFade
iniValues.notes: fSpecularLODMaxStartFade sets the maximum value for the in-game settings display menu Specularity Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fSpecularLODMinStartFade
iniValues.notes: fSpecularLODMinStartFade sets the minimum value for the in-game settings display menu Specularity Fade slider.

iniValues.name: fSpecularLODRange
iniValues.notes: fSpecularLODRange sets the range away from the fSpecularLODStartFade distance that specular effects fade.

iniValues.name: iAnimationClonePerLoop
iniValues.notes: Max number of animations to clone per AnimData::Update call.

iniValues.name: iAudioCacheSize
iniValues.notes: iAudioCacheSize sets the audio file cache size.

iniValues.name: iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure
iniValues.notes: iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure sets the max index of grasses listed in the LTEX landscape texture record that will be used in grass creation.

iniValues.name: iMaxSizeForCachedSound
iniValues.notes: iMaxSizeForCachedSound sets the maximum cached sound size.

iniValues.name: iMinGrassSize
iniValues.notes: iMinGrassSize sets the grass density. Lower values produce more grass and higher values produce less grass.

iniValues.name: iNumHWThreads
iniValues.notes: Values of 3 or more spreads AI and game logic updates across 2 threads for better performance, but may require the New Vegas Tick Fix mod.

iniValues.name: iPostProcessMilliseconds
iniValues.notes: iPostProcessMilliseconds sets the time limit for queued tasks.

iniValues.name: iPresentInterval
iniValues.notes: iPresentInterval sets vertical synchronization (VSync), which removes screen tearing. 0 is off and 1 is on. Higher values enable fractional VSync.

value.default: Fallout - Textures.bsa, Fallout - Textures2.bsa, Fallout - Meshes.bsa, Fallout - Voices1.bsa, Fallout - Sound.bsa, Fallout - Misc.bsa

iniValues.name: SScreenShotBaseName
iniValues.notes: SScreenShotBaseName sets the base filename of screenshots. You can input a full path to redirect to a new location.

value.default: No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile
No Default string. Must be loaded from INIFile

iniValues.name: uGridsToLoad
iniValues.notes: uGridsToLoad sets how many grids will be actively rendered and processed around the Player Character (PC).

iniValues.name: uMaxSkinDecalPerActor
iniValues.notes: uMaxSkinDecalPerActor sets the maximum number of skinned decals per actor.

iniValues.name: uMaxSkinDecals
iniValues.notes: uMaxSkinDecals sets the maximum number of skinned decals.

iniValues.name: bDialogueSubtitles
iniValues.notes: bDialogueSubtitles toggles subtitles for NPCs who are directly talking to you.

iniValues.name: bGeneralSubtitles
iniValues.notes: bGeneralSubtitles toggles subtitles for NPCs who are not directly talking to you.

iniValues.name: bSaveOnRest
iniValues.notes: bSaveOnRest toggles autosaves made after sleeping.

iniValues.name: bSaveOnTravel
iniValues.notes: bSaveOnTravel toggles autosaves made after traveling to different locations.

iniValues.name: bSaveOnWait
iniValues.notes: bSaveOnWait toggles autosaves made after waiting.

iniValues.name: b30GrassVS
iniValues.notes: b30GrassVS toggles using 3.0 vertex shader for drawing grass, which allows drawing more grass with better performance.

iniValues.name: bDisable360Controller
iniValues.notes: bDisable360Controller toggles the ability to use a controller.

iniValues.name: uHUDColor
iniValues.notes: uHUDColor sets the color of the HUD. Be aware that some mods (e.g., Main and Pause Menus Overhaul) may override this setting.

iniValues.name: uPipboyColor
iniValues.notes: uPipboyColor sets the color of the Pip-Boy. Be aware that some mods (e.g., Main and Pause Menus Overhaul) may override this setting.

iniValues.name: fLODFadeOutMultActors
iniValues.notes: fLODFadeOutMultActors sets the actor fade distance.

iniValues.name: bDoDepthOfField
iniValues.notes: bDoDepthOfField toggles depth of field (DOF), a kind of blurring to imitate the human eye's perception.

iniValues.name: bDoHighDynamicRange
iniValues.notes: Toggles the HDR lighting effect. This has nothing to do with HDR monitors.

iniValues.name: bInvertYValues
iniValues.notes: bInvertYValues toggles the ability of the the mouse to be inverted over the y-axis (up and down movement).

iniValues.name: fMouseSensitivity
iniValues.notes: fMouseSensitivity sets the look sensitivity (how fast the camera moves in response to the mouse).

iniValues.name: uMaxDecals
iniValues.notes:
uMaxDecals sets the maximum amount of spawned object decals (such as from firearms) until they start to fade. More decals can spawn then the maximum. 

Source: https://geckwiki.com/index.php?title=INI_Settings

iniValues.name: bEnableEyefinity
iniValues.notes: bEnableEyefinity toggles support for AMD Eyefinity display configurations. Disabling this may be necessary for granular control of other settings to work.

iniValues.name: bFull Screen
iniValues.notes: bFull Screen toggles whether the game displays in exclusive fullscreen mode or windowed mode.

iniValues.name: bTransparencyMultisampling
iniValues.notes: bTransparencyMultisampling toggles transparency antialiasing on textures for better quality, especially on foliage.

iniValues.name: fDecalLOD1
iniValues.notes: fDecalLOD1 sets the distance decals start to fade.

iniValues.name: fDecalLOD2
iniValues.notes: fDecalLOD2 sets the distance where decals are fully faded out.

iniValues.name: fLightLODStartFade
iniValues.notes: fLightLODStartFade sets the distance where light starts to fade.

iniValues.name: fShadowLODStartFade
iniValues.notes: fShadowLODStartFade sets the distance where shadows starts to fade.

iniValues.name: fSpecularLODStartFade
iniValues.notes: fSpecularLODStartFade sets the distance where specular effects start to fade.

iniValues.name: iActorShadowCountExt
iniValues.notes: iActorShadowCountExt sets the maximum number of actor shadows in exteriors.

iniValues.name: iActorShadowCountInt
iniValues.notes: iActorShadowCountInt sets the maximum number of actor shadows in interiors.

iniValues.name: iMaxAnisotropy
iniValues.notes: iMaxAnisotropy sets the level of anisotropic filtering (AF), improving the texture quality of distant objects.

iniValues.name: iMaxDecalsPerFrame
iniValues.notes: iMaxDecalsPerFrame sets the maximum number of decals that can be shown per frame.

iniValues.name: iMaxSkinDecalsPerFrame
iniValues.notes: iMaxSkinDecalsPerFrame sets the maximum number of skinned decals that can be shown per frame.

iniValues.name: iMultiSample
iniValues.notes: iMultiSample sets the level of antialiasing (AA) applied to edges to make them smoother and less jagged.

iniValues.name: iScreenShotIndex
iniValues.notes: iScreenShotIndex sets the screenshot index number.

iniValues.name: iShadowFilter
iniValues.notes: iShadowFilter sets the level of filtering (a kind of blurring of the edges) to shadows.

iniValues.name: iShadowMapResolution
iniValues.notes: iShadowMapResolution sets the resolution of actor shadows.

iniValues.name: iSize H
iniValues.notes: iSize H sets the game resolution height.

iniValues.name: iSize W
iniValues.notes: iSize W sets the game resolution width.

iniValues.name: iTexMipMapSkip
iniValues.notes: iTexMipMapSkip sets the texture quality by specifying how many of the top mipmap levels of textures to skip loading. It is recommended to leave this at 0.

iniValues.name: fBlockLoadDistance
iniValues.notes: fBlockLoadDistance sets the maximum distance to render "High Priority" LOD.

iniValues.name: fBlockLoadDistanceLow
iniValues.notes: fBlockLoadDistanceLow sets the maximum distance to render normal LOD.

iniValues.name: fGrassStartFadeDistance
iniValues.notes: fGrassStartFadeDistance sets the distance where grass starts to fade.

iniValues.name: fLODFadeOutMultItems
iniValues.notes: fLODFadeOutMultItems sets the item fade distance.

iniValues.name: fLODFadeOutMultObjects
iniValues.notes: fLODFadeOutMultObjects sets the object fade distance.

iniValues.name: fSplitDistanceMult
iniValues.notes: fSplitDistanceMult sets the terrain LOD distance multiplier.
